author: Erin Sagen, The Washington Post
title: The calming power of simple walk...
description: The wind has bite, but the sun is high and indiscriminate on this early-spring day. Three blocks from the local high school, the usual choke of cars that idle on my street at 3 o'clock has disappeared, as has the noise that blasted from them. On the sidewalk,…
